character.age: 22 years old, with a youthful energy that belies their actual age
character.role: Main Protagonist/Leader of the Rebel Alliance
character.background: Arin was born and raised in a small village on the outskirts of the kingdom. They grew up watching the injustices of the world around them, which eventually drove them to join the rebel movement. After years of training and fighting, they rose through the ranks to become one of the leaders.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown, often tied in a ponytail
